channel.title: Server Lag?
channel.description: Is anyone else having a problem with lag on the server? From what I remember about 2 or 3 weeks ago it was lagging pretty badly and ever since then there is just terrible lag all the time.

item.title: Server Lag?
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Spankr Poodle, post:13, topic:420393”]Alright, Now lag is getting annoying. I was getting hit by cave spiders that were 4 or 5 blocks away from me due to the lag. The spiders were going to the places I was just at, not actually going after me.[/quote]Cave Spiders are glitched in multi.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Lag?
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/249637-181-optifine-hd-d-fps-boost-hd-textures/

Make sure you get one for 1.8.1 and pick out which one you think would be best for you. Like I have a core 2 duo processor so I use the multi threaded version.

Also, are you sure you deleted the META-INF folder?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Lag?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

How exactly do you mean?

EDIT: It’s gotten so bad now I can’t even log on Moparcraft, it crashes due to lagg. I’ve tried the other server and it’s lagg free. I don’t know what’s up but something on Moparcraft is mashing shit up for me.

Right spent some time changing stuff I can now play - I think optifine was actually the issue here, I installed it to combat the lagg I get on Moparcraft but it ended up causing more lagg to a point of 0 FPS, now it’s uninstalled I’m getting ~40 FPS

Read full topic

@omgilikepie wrote:

I use optifine also. :S You more than likely know it, but you know you can get rid of that lag spike of death with optifine, right?

item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I get the same thing happening to me while other servers work fine. Could it be the plugins, or maybe the two worlds being hosted? I need to buy new RAM anyway, hope to have 4GB of RAM by Christmas

Read full topic

item.title: Server Lag?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m getting this recently, except it’s major FPS issues and loading - and no it’s not my PC. I’ve tried tons of servers I run fine, but as soon as I log on Moparcraft shit hits the fan and the usage goes through the roof and the FPS drops by 90%.

Even with tiny render on it’s doing this, even when I’m in the middle of nowhere! I’ve been down lists and logged on other servers and played without fail so this isn’t an issue with my PC, and it’s brand new.

UPDATE: Done some testing, when I’m on another server I’m using about 400-600MB (render can be on full) RAM, whereas on Moparcraft it can reach 1.6GB RAM (even when render is on tiny).

What changes on Moparcraft that would cause it to put huge amounts of stress on my PC? Using ~1GB more RAM.

FURTHER UPDATE:

Here is an image of my graph on moparcraft, usually it’s really low but for some reason it’s really choppy.

Even with optifine it’s like this :s

Read full topic

item.title: Server Lag?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

I get some lag when there are a lot of players online. Sometimes I start getting a shitton of chunk updates which causes a lot of lag, but this is rare (and I’m not sure what causes it).

Read full topic

item.title: Server Lag?
item.dc:creator: @Spankr_Poodle Spankr Poodle
item.description:
@Spankr_Poodle wrote:

Every once in awhile I will get lags where I break a block, but the block stays there, but it is a phantom block. I can walk through it, and place blocks where it is. So it is pretty much just an image.

Other than that, I haven’t had that bad of lag.

Read full topic
